DOC.brief_summary: The investigator evaluate efficacy multi-strain probiotic adult diarrhea predominant irritable bowel syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Multi-strain Probiotics Adults With Diarrhea Predominant Irritable Bowel Syndrome
DOC.criteria: willing consent/undergo necessary procedure age 19 75 year diarrhea predominant irritable bowel syndrome ( satisfied Rome II criterion ) uncontrolled hypertension ( Blood pressure > 180/110 mmHg ) uncontrolled diabetes mellitus ( FBS > 200 mg/dL ) malignancy , cerebrovascular disease , cardiovascular disease history abdominal surgery except appendectomy hernia repair inflammatory bowel disease clinically laboratoryconfirmed gastroenteritis use motility drug dietary fiber supplement 2 week serum Cr > 2 x Upper normal limit AST ALT > 2 x Upper normal limit Pregnancy , Lactating woman
